thread.title: Rocky Mountain National Park poised to break visitor record
thread.title_full: Rocky Mountain National Park poised to break visitor record - seattlepi.com

author: seattlepi.com
title: Rocky Mountain National Park poised to break visitor record
text:
ROCKY MOUNTAIN NATIONAL PARK, Colo. (AP) â€” Rocky Mountain National Park is on pace to break last year's annual visitor record.
The Coloradoan reports ( http://goo.gl/WXOaQe ) that the park has attracted 2.9 million visitors through August, which is an increase of 20 percent over the same period last year. The park is on pace to draw more than 4.1 million visitors this year.
Last year, the park saw a record-breaking 3.4 million visitors.
Park officials say they expect to break the record in September, which is their busiest month due to the aspens changing colors and the elk mating season, which draws many visitors.
___
Information from: Fort Collins Coloradoan, http://www.coloradoan.com
